pages.text: $(l)Bounties are $(l)challenges$() that can be completed in order to receive $(l)Vault Experience$(), $(l)Items$() and $(l)Transmogs.$() $(br2)Use the Bounty Table to activate a bounty. Only one bounty can be activated at any time.

When a bounty is activated, complete the task as described and claim the rewards in the Bounty Table when completed. $(br2)If you want to cancel a bounty, it can be abandoned for an $(l)Abandon Penalty.$() $(br2)Once completed, there is a small cooldown period for a new bounty to appear. $(br2)Bounties can be rerolled at the costs of Vault Bronze.
